TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlAttributes extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示控制 串行化和反序列化对象方式的属性对象的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of attribute objects that control how the serializes and deserializes an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建是将重写默认的进程的一部分方式序列化类实例。Creating the is part of a process that overrides the default way the serializes class instances. 例如，假设你想要从其源不可访问的 DLL 创建将对象序列化。For example, suppose you want to serialize an object that is created from a DLL which has an inaccessible source. 通过使用，可以增加或其他方式控制如何序列化对象。By using the , you can augment or otherwise control how the object is serialized. 成员类直接对应于一系列的控制序列化的特性类。The members of the class correspond directly to a family of attribute classes that control serialization. 例如，属性必须设置为，它可以通过指示重写字段或属性的序列化要序列化作为 XML 文本的属性值。For example, the property must be set to an , which allows you to override serialization of a field or property by instructing the to serialize the property value as XML text. 控制序列化的属性的完整列表，请参阅。For a complete list of attributes that control serialization, see the . 有关使用更多详细信息与类，请参阅[如何： 指定 XML Stream 的备用元素名称](~/docs/standard/serialization/how-to-specify-an-alternate-element-name-for-an-xml-stream.md)。For more details on using the with the class, see [How to: Specify an Alternate Element Name for an XML Stream](~/docs/standard/serialization/how-to-specify-an-alternate-element-name-for-an-xml-stream.md). ## Examples 下面的示例将名为的类的实例序列化为`Orchestra`，其中包含名为的单个字段`Instruments`返回的数组`Instrument`对象。The following example serializes an instance of a class named `Orchestra`, which contains a single field named `Instruments` that returns an array of `Instrument` objects. 名为第二个类`Brass`继承`Instrument`类。A second class named `Brass` inherits from the `Instrument` class. 此示例将创建对象来重写`Instrument`域 — — 允许字段接受`Brass`对象-，并将对象的实例与类。The example creates an object to override the `Instrument` field--allowing the field to accept `Brass` objects--and adds the object to an instance of the class. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlAttributes Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlAttributes Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlAttributes Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlAttributes Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlAttributes Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlAttributes Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets the to override.
The to override.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以应用于返回的数组成员上反序列化的对象。The can be applied to a member that returns an array of objects on deserialization. 这允许进行反序列化任何属性不具有相应成员导致对象被反序列化-因此这些元素是"未知"的。This allows the to deserialize any attributes that do not have a corresponding member in the object being deserialized--thus those elements are "unknown" to the . 由 XML Web 服务，更改 XML 流后或知道随机数据始终是包含在 XML 流时，这非常有用。This is useful when the XML stream has been altered by an XML Web service, or when it is known that random data is always included with the XML stream. 属性允许您向其成员的序列化重写已应用。The property allows you to override the serialization of a member to which the has been applied.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property XmlAnyElements As XmlAnyElementAttributes

summary.span: 获取要替代的 对象集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of objects to override.

value.span: 表示 对象集合的 对象。

span.span: An object that represents the collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以应用于返回的数组成员上反序列化的对象。The can be applied to a member that returns an array of objects on deserialization. 这允许进行反序列化任何元素不具有相应成员导致对象被反序列化-因此这些元素是"未知"的。This allows the to deserialize any elements that do not have a corresponding member in the object being deserialized--thus those elements are "unknown" to the . 由 XML Web 服务，更改 XML 流后或知道随机数据始终是包含在 XML 流时，这非常有用。This is useful when the XML stream has been altered by an XML Web service, or when it is known that random data is always included with the XML stream. 属性可以重写的成员，才能为其成员函数序列化已应用。The property allows you to override the serialization of a member to function as a member to which the has been applied. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个新对象，并将其添加到通过访问的对象的集合属性。The following example creates a new object and adds it to the collection of objects accessed through the property. 随后将对象添加到用于创建对象对象。The object is then added to a object which is used to create an object. 用于序列化或反序列化对象。The is used to serialize or deserialize an object. 若要查看使用的效果属性，创建 XML 文档通过运行名为"UnknownElements.xml"`SerializeObject`中的方法`Main`方法。To see the effect of using the property, create an XML document named "UnknownElements.xml" by running the `SerializeObject` method in the `Main` method. 编辑生成的文档，以包括其他 （未知） 元素。Edit the resulting document to include other (unknown) elements. 注释掉`SerializeObject`调用中的`Main`方法，并取消注释对的调用`DeserializeObject`方法，将输出名称和任何未知的 XML 元素的值。Comment out the `SerializeObject` call in the `Main` method, and uncomment the call to the `DeserializeObject` method, which prints out the name and value of any unknown XML element. [!code-cpp[XmlAttributes.XmlAnyElements#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlAttributes.XmlAnyElements/CPP/xmlanyover.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlAttributes.XmlAnyElements#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlAttributes.XmlAnyElements/CS/xmlanyover.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlAttributes.XmlAnyElements#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlAttributes.XmlAnyElements/VB/xmlanyover.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个对象，该对象指定 串行化返回数组的公共字段或读/写属性的方式。

span.span: Gets or sets an object that specifies how the serializes a public field or read/write property that returns an array.

value.span: 一个 ，指定 序列化如何返回数组的公共字段或读/写属性。

span.span: An that specifies how the serializes a public field or read/write property that returns an array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有两种方法中的公共字段或公共读/写属性，返回一个数组，序列化： 默认序列化和受控的序列化。There are two ways in which a public field or public read/write property that returns an array is serialized by the : the default serialization, and the controlled serialization. 在默认的序列化，没有属性应用于的成员。In the default serialization, no attribute is applied to the member. 序列化时，数组序列化为 XML 元素的具有嵌套序列成员名称的 XML 元素名称的嵌套序列。When serialized, the array is serialized as a nested sequence of XML elements with the XML element name of the nested sequence taken from the member name. 若要更精确地控制的序列化，应用到字段或属性。To control the serialization more precisely, apply an to the field or property. 例如，您可以更改生成的 XML 元素名称从默认值为不同的名称通过设置属性的新值。For example, you can change the generated XML element name from the default to a different name by setting the property to a new value. 属性允许你重写默认的序列化，以及通过应用控制的序列化到的成员。The property allows you to override the default serialization, as well as the serialization controlled by applying an to the member. 例如，可以更改为新值从默认值 （成员标识符） 生成的 XML 元素名称。For example, you can change the XML element name generated from the default (the member identifier) to a new value. 此外，如果将应用成员，它重写任何分配给属性。In addition, if you apply an to a member, it is overridden by any that is assigned to the property. ## Examples 下面的示例序列化类，其中包含一个名为字段`Members`返回对象的数组。The following example serializes a class that contains a field named `Members` that returns an array of objects. 用于重写字段的序列化和重命名的元素名称`Staff`。The is used to override the serialization of the field, and rename the element name to `Staff`. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlArray Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlArray Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlArray Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlArray Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlArray Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlArray Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个对象集合，该集合指定 序列化插入数组（由公共字段或读/写属性返回）的项的方式。

span.span: Gets or sets a collection of objects that specify how the serializes items inserted into an array returned by a public field or read/write property.

value.span: 对象，它包含 对象的集合。

span.span: An object that contains a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以指定要插入到数组返回的公共字段或公共读/写属性的派生的类型。The property allows you to specify the derived types that can be inserted into an array returned by a public field or public read/write property. 对于所需的字段或属性接受每个新类型，创建对象和到) 返回的属性。For each new type you want the field or property to accept, create an object and it to the ) returned by the property. （新的类型必须派生自已接受的字段或属性的类型。） 对象传递给对象，并指定包含该字段或属性，该对象的类型和字段或属性的名称。(The new type must be derived from the type already accepted by the field or property.) the object to an object and specify the type of the object that contains the field or property, and the name of the field or property. 构造与对象之前调用或方法。Construct an with the object before calling or method. ## Examples 下面的示例序列化类，其中包含一个名为字段`Members`返回对象的数组。The following example serializes a class that contains a field named `Members` that returns an array of objects. 两个创建对象以允许要接受从名为的基类派生的对象的字段`Member`。Two objects are created to allow the field to accept objects that derive from the base class named `Member`. 每个对象添加到通过属性。Each object is added to the through the property. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlArrayItems Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlArrayItems Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlArrayItems Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlArrayItems Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlArrayItems Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlArrayItems Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个对象，该对象指定 将公共字段或公共读/写属性串行化为 XML 特性的方式。

span.span: Gets or sets an object that specifies how the serializes a public field or public read/write property as an XML attribute.

value.span: 控制将公共字段或读/写属性序列化为 XML 特性的 。

span.span: An that controls the serialization of a public field or read/write property as an XML attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，如果没有属性应用于公共字段或公共读/写属性，会将它序列化为 XML 元素。By default, if no attribute is applied to a public field or public read/write property, it is serialized as an XML element. 此外可以指示通过将应用生成一个 XML 特性到字段或属性。You can also instruct the to generate an XML attribute by applying an to the field or property. 属性允许你重写默认的序列化，以及通过应用控制的序列化到的成员。The property allows you to override the default serialization, as well as the serialization controlled by applying an to the member. 若要执行此操作，创建并设置其属性 (如)。To do this, create an and set its properties (such as ). 分配到新的对象属性的对象。Assign the new object to the property of an object. 添加对象传递给对象，并指定包含该字段或属性，该对象的类型和字段或属性的名称。Add the object to an object and specify the type of the object that contains the field or property, and the name of the field or property. 最后，创建使用对象，并调用或方法。Lastly, create an using the object and call the or method. ## Examples 下面的示例将名为的类序列化为`Group`，其中包含名为的属性`GroupName`;`GroupName`属性序列化为 XML 特性。The following example serializes a class named `Group` that contains a property named `GroupName`; the `GroupName` property is serialized as an XML attribute. 此示例将创建和一个对象来重写默认的序列化的字段。The example creates an and an object to override the default serialization of the field. 该示例然后创建来特别重写该属性，并且该对象设置为属性对象添加到具有指定的重写成员名称的对象。The example then creates an to specifically override the property, and the object is set to the property The object is added to the object with the name of the overridden member specified. 最后，是构建并返回使用对象。Finally, an is constructed and returned using the object. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 XML 元素或属性的默认值。

span.span: Gets or sets the default value of an XML element or attribute.

value.span: 表示 XML 元素或属性的默认值的 。

span.span: An that represents the default value of an XML element or attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过应用指定的 XML 元素或 XML 属性的默认值成员。You can specify the default value of an XML element or XML attribute by applying a to a member. 若要检查应用的值的结果，编译到 DLL 或可执行文件，该应用程序并将生成的文件作为参数传递到 XML 架构定义工具 (XSD.exe)。To examine the result of applying the value, compile the application into a DLL or executable, and pass the resulting file as an argument to the XML Schema Definition tool (XSD.exe). 在 XML 架构文档中，默认值分配给`default`属性。In the XML schema document, a default value is assigned to the `default` attribute. 在下面的示例中的默认值为\<动物 > 元素是"狗"。In the following example, the default for the \ element is "Dogs." ``` ``` 若要替代默认值，创建并将其分配给。To override the default value, create an and assign it to the . 分配给字段或属性的值是否相等的默认值为该字段或属性，不序列化到 XML 实例的值。If the value assigned to a field or property is equal to the default value for that field or property, the does not serialize the value to the XML-instance. 这是因为可以从 XML 架构中恢复所赋的值。This is because the assigned value can be recovered from the XML schema. 换而言之，将字段或属性设置为默认值是根本不设置它的等效。In other words, setting a field or property to its own default value is equivalent of not setting it at all. 同样，如果未设置值的字段或属性，使用默认值在架构中找到。Likewise, if no value is set for the field or property, the uses the default value found in the schema. 在同时情况下，将属性设置为其默认值，或根本不设置），XML 文档实例不包含任何值的属性。In both cases, (setting the property to its default, or not setting it at all), the XML-document instance does not contain any value for the property. 您可以使用而不是架构类构造函数分配的默认值。You can use the class constructors instead of the schema to assign the default values. 如果使用 Xsd.exe 从架构生成类，你可以注释掉或从类文件中删除所有 [System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute("myFieldName")] 属性。If you are using Xsd.exe to generate a classes from schemas, you can comment out or remove all of the [System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute("myFieldName")] attributes from the class files. ## Examples 下面的示例演示一个名为类`Pet`，其中包含具有默认值设置为"Dog"的字段。The following example shows a class named `Pet` that contains a field that has a default value set to "Dog". 但是，此示例还创建对象，并设置其属性的新默认值 ("Cat")。However, the example also creates an object, and sets its property to a new default value ("Cat"). 这将覆盖原始默认值。This overrides the original default value. 因此，如果字段值设置为"Cat"将其视为默认值，并不将其序列化。Thus, if the field value is set to "Cat", the treats it as the default value, and not serialize it. 如果设置为任何其他值，序列化值。If it is set to any other value, the serializes the value. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlDefaultValue Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlDefaultValue Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlDefaultValue Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlDefaultValue Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlDefaultValue Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlDefaultValue Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that specify how the serializes a public field or read/write property as an XML element.

value.span: 包含一个 对象集合的 。

span.span: An that contains a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于每个序列化为 XML 元素的重写成员，必须添加一个新到通过调用方法。For each overridden member that is serialized as an XML element, you must add a new to an by calling the method. 默认情况下创建对象并将其分配给属性。By default, an object is created and assigned to the property. ## Examples 下面的示例序列化为`Transportation`类，该类包含一个名为的单个字段`Vehicles`返回。The following example serializes the `Transportation` class, which contains a single field named `Vehicles` that returns an . 该示例将应用两个属性到`Vehicles`字段。The example applies two attributes to the `Vehicles` field. 该示例创建两个对象，并将它们添加到的集合对象。The example creates two objects and adds them to the collection of an object. 若要允许要接受不同的对象类型的数组对象添加到对象。To allow the array to accept different object types, the object is added to the object. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlElements Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlElements Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlElements Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlElements Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlElements Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlElements Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个对象，该对象指定 串行化枚举成员的方式。

span.span: Gets or sets an object that specifies how the serializes an enumeration member.

value.span: 指定 如何序列化枚举成员的 。

span.span: An that specifies how the serializes an enumeration member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于想要重写每个标识符，必须创建对象，并设置属性设置为重写的标识符。For each identifier you want to override, you must create an object, and set the property to an that overrides the identifier. 添加对象传递给对象，并指定这两个包含枚举和重写的成员名称的类。Add the object to the object and specify both the of the class that contains the enumeration, and the overridden member name. ## Examples 下面的示例将名为两个类序列化为`Food`和`FoodType`。The following example serializes two classes named `Food` and `FoodType`. `FoodType`类包含两个枚举已重写的并且对于每个枚举，该示例将创建对象，它将分配给属性的对象。The `FoodType` class contains two enumerations that are overridden and, for each enumeration, the example creates an object that it assigns to the property of an object. 然后该示例添加对象传递给对象，用于创建。The example then adds the object to an object, which is used to create an . [!code-cpp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlEnum Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlEnum Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlEnum Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlEnum Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlEnum Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlEnum Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定 是否串行化公共字段或公共读/写属性。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether or not the serializes a public field or public read/write property.

value.span: 如果 不得序列化字段或属性，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the must not serialize the field or property; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，所有公共字段和公共读/写属性进行序列化的。By default, all public fields and public read/write properties are serialized by the . 也就是说，每个公共字段或属性的值被存储为 XML 元素或 XML 文档实例中的 XML 特性。That is, the value of each public field or property is persisted as an XML element or XML attribute in an XML-document instance. 若要重写字段或属性的默认序列化，创建对象，并设置其属性设置为`true`。To override the default serialization of a field or property, create an object, and set its property to `true`. 到对象对象，并指定类型的对象，其中包含的字段或属性，若要忽略，并且若要忽略的属性的字段的名称。 the object to an object and specify the type of the object that contains the field or property to ignore, and the name of the field or property to ignore. 如果应用于字段或属性，忽略的字段或属性。If an is applied to a field or property, the field or property is ignored. 但是通过创建重写该行为对象，并设置其属性设置为`false`，将其添加到对象，它指定包含该字段或属性，该对象的类型和名称字段或属性。However you can override that behavior by creating an object, setting its property to `false`, adding it to an object specifying the type of the object that contains the field or property, and the name of the field or property. ## Examples 下面的示例将名为的类序列化为`Group`，其中包含一个名为成员`Comment`到应用。The following example serializes a class named `Group`, which contains a member named `Comment` to which the is applied. 此示例将创建对象，并设置属性设置为`false`，从而重写。The example creates an object, and sets the property to `false`, thereby overriding the . [!code-cpp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlIgnore Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlIgnore Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlIgnore Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlIgnore Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlIgnore Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlIgnore Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定当替代包含返回 对象的成员的对象时，是否保留所有的命名空间声明。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to keep all namespace declarations when an object containing a member that returns an object is overridden.

value.span: 如果应保留命名空间声明，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the namespace declarations should be kept; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例包含一个名为类`Student`。The following example contains a class named `Student`. 此类包含一个名为成员`MyNamespaces`，它返回对象。The class contains a member named `MyNamespaces` that returns an object. 此示例将创建添加到的实例对象类。The example creates an object that is added to an instance of the class. 属性设置为`true`，它指示保留命名空间时的序列化`Student`对象重写。The property is set to `true`, which instructs the to preserve the namespaces when the serialization of the `Student` object is overridden. value.span: 重写特性化为 XML 根元素的类的 。

span.span: An that overrides a class attributed as an XML root element.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例创建对象，对象，和一个对象。The following example creates an object, an object, and an object. 该示例将分配到的属性对象，并添加对象传递给对象。The example assigns the to the property of the object, and adds the object to the object. 最后，示例将获取对象通过传递序列化到类的对象。Lastly, the example gets the object by passing the of the serialized class to the object. (在此示例中，是`Group`。)(In this example, the is `Group`.) summary.span: 获取或设置一个对象，该对象指示 将公共字段或公共读/写属性串行化为 XML 文本。

span.span: Gets or sets an object that instructs the to serialize a public field or public read/write property as XML text.

value.span: 重写公共属性或字段的默认序列化的 。

span.span: An that overrides the default serialization of a public property or field.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，公共字段或公共读/写属性序列化为 XML 元素由。By default, a public field or public read/write property is serialized as an XML element by the . 但是，它可以强制字段或属性序列化为 XML 文本，通过应用到字段或属性。However, it can force the field or property to be serialized as XML text by applying an to the field or property. > [!NOTE] > 不能应用于字段或属性，返回一个数组，该属性。The cannot be applied to a field or property that returns an array. 若要重写默认的序列化的字段或属性 （即不返回数组），创建并将其分配给属性的对象。To override the default serialization of a field or property (that does not return an array), create an and assign it to the property of an object. 添加对象传递给对象，并指定包含重写的字段或属性，该对象的类型和重写的字段或属性的名称。Add the object to an object and specify the type of the object that contains the overridden field or property, and the name of the overridden field or property. ## Examples 下面的示例将名为的类序列化为`Group`，其中包含一个名为字段`Comment`。The following example serializes the class named `Group`, which contains a field named `Comment`. 重写默认方式序列化字段，该示例将创建和对象。To override the default way the serializes the field, the example creates an and an object. 该示例然后创建对象，它将分配给属性，并添加对象 （具有要序列化为 XML 文本的字段的名称） 到对象。The example then creates an object, which it assigns to the property, and adds the object (with the name of the field to be serialized as XML text) to the object. 此示例将创建最后使用对象。Lastly the example creates an using the object. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlText Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlText Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlText Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个对象，该对象指定 串行化已对其应用 的类的方式。

span.span: Gets or sets an object that specifies how the serializes a class to which the has been applied.

value.span: 重写应用于类声明的 的 。

span.span: An that overrides an applied to a class declaration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可用于控制类型序列化的方式。The can be used to control how a type is serialized by the . 例如，默认情况下，当序列化类型，类名用作 XML 元素名称。For example, by default, when a type is serialized, the uses the class name as the XML element name. 通过创建，并设置属性，以及创建对象，可以更改 XML 元素名称。By creating an , setting the property to it, and creating an object, you can change the XML element name. ## Examples 下面的示例创建对象，并将它分配给属性的对象。The following example creates an object, and assigns it to the property of an object. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlType Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlType Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlType Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
